title: Fragment, "Les Losange  (Lozenges)", ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation
dimensions:
Warp 72cm (28 1/4). Weft: 95cm (37 1/4in.) Both edges cut but almost full width.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 51.5cm (20 1/4in.).
description: Medallions and cartouches, containing various mythological figures on a diamond grid of lozenges. In brown on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, "Les Losange  (Lozenges)", ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-56.
